>
[Merciless Rend](/Feats.aspx?ID=2923) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Eidolon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=386" />
<trait label="Evolution" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=394" />
<trait label="Summoner" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=392" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 71 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Requirements**
Your eidolon hit the same enemy with two consecutive Strikes with its secondary attack this turn and dealt slashing damage with both.

</column>

---

Your eidolon rends its foes. It automatically deals the damage from its secondary attack to the enemy.
